alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 8:25PM CST until December 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow and freezing drizzle expected Wednesday through Friday, potentially prolonging winter impacts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
